title: The Endurance Saga
description: A group of rough and tough lizard-humanoid aliens called Firm abduct unlucky humans from earth. The captain of this species, Tork-prepares for diabolical plans. His son, Gunner, has other thoughts. Thoughts of rebellion to take down his sadistic father.Meanwhile, a space vessel known as The Endurance is tasked with bringing down Captain Tork. Keli Abrams, her son, and many others become the forefront of this rescue mission, risking their lives for the good of the galaxy…​J.A. Flynn, author of Forlorn and Darak the Minotaur, welcomes you to a sci-fi world full of his trademark use of creatures, action, horror, and heart.
author: J.A.  Flynn
